figure_1.title: Figure 1.
figure_1.caption: Pathways targeted by nanomaterials to travel across BBB.

figure_2.title: Figure 2.
figure_2.caption: Schematic representation of different nanomaterials for brain cancer therapy: Polymers, micelles, liposomes, dendrimers, gold, silver, and iron nanoparticles, and quantum dots.

claims.sentence: In fact, 5 major mechanisms can be used to cross the BBB: adsorptive transcytosis (AMT), paracellular transport, carrier-mediated transport (CMT), receptor-mediated transcytosis (RMT), and passive transcellular diffusion (Figure 1).
Figure 2 shows the schematic representation of various nanomaterials used for brain cancer therapy.

In fact, 5 major mechanisms can be used to cross the BBB: adsorptive transcytosis (AMT), paracellular transport, carrier-mediated transport (CMT), receptor-mediated transcytosis (RMT), and passive transcellular diffusion (Figure 1).
Figure 2 shows the schematic representation of various nanomaterials used for brain cancer therapy.
